occupation: PhD Candidate at Nanyang Technological University

experiences.title: PhD Candidate
experiences.description:
I was assigned in Information Systems Research Laboratory. I was conducting a research study in the field of array signal processing. I was working on the development of MUSIC-like algorithm to offer a complete solution in radar signal processing without estimating the number of sources.

I was also assigned to become teaching assistant in two courses:
1. EE4718 Enterprise Network Design (2 semesters)
I taught hands-on session of the class where the students learned to configure a network: setting up firewall, implement IPv6 tunnelling, etc.
2. EE3014 Digital Signal Processing (1 semester)
I was assigned in the flipped classroom session. Therefore, I designed the online activities and quizzes.


            

    
    

    
        Lihat lebih sedikit

experiences.title: Apprentice
experiences.description: In Business Unit Attachment, I was assigned to join BP (Business Partners) Geo-expansion team. In this team, we're trying to develop IBM BPs in Geo-city (e.g. Balikpapan and Bandung).

experiences.title: Student Representative - Board of Trustees (Majelis Wali Amanat)
experiences.description: ITB Board of Trustees consists of Central Government (Ministry of Education) Representative, Local Government (West Java Province) Representative, Community Representatives, Academic Senate Representatives, Rector, and Student Representative. As the Student Representative, I was delivering the aspiration of the students to the board. I also delivered strategic policies of ITB to ITB students. In my period, ITB was in the middle of transition period due to changing of its legal status.

experiences.title: Intern
experiences.description: I was assigned in Control and Defence System Business Unit to conduct a study of military radio. I was studying 4-PAM Modem and was conducting some experiments in MATLAB. I also designed the User Interface for the radio.

education.description: I was the youngest (15 years old) student to get admitted in my batch. I was also the youngest member of the Board of Trustees.

I did not need a 1st class honour, GRE, and IELTS test to get admitted with full scholarship while I was still 20 years old. I resigned from my study at the end of 9th semester. But, it does not mean I am not smarter than those who graduate.

accomplishment_organisations.title: PJS MWA WM (Caretaker of MWA Student-Representative Member)

accomplishment_organisations.org_name: Incubator of Ideas and Innovations (Inkubator Ide dan Inovasi Mahasiswa)
accomplishment_organisations.title: President
accomplishment_organisations.description: In this organization, we were trying to build a conducive environment for student collaboration and innovation. Because of our wonderful teamwork (I3M and Ganesha TV), we succeeded to launch three Presenticcon (Idea Showcase) events, and two of them can be watched on youtube (keyword: Presenticcon). We also succeeded to set up the 1st event of TEDxBandung.

accomplishment_publications.name: Belajar Cara Belajar
accomplishment_publications.description:
Belajar Cara Belajar (Learning How to Learn) is a quick-reference book adapted from the (Google-sponsored) Learning How to Learn Courses in Hujan Tanda Tanya. It provides a framework on how to develop your own learning system (metalearning).

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bv7IBHh1w-A&list=PLk57zHLKlnT8EY7E5D_j-7HciTdbnF3tR

accomplishment_publications.name: Mengenal Sistem Pendidikan Singapura
accomplishment_publications.description: In English: Introduction to Singapore Education System. I took part in writing an overview of Singapore education system as one of the programs of the Education Attache of the Embassy of the Republic of Indonesia, Singapore.

accomplishment_honors_awards.title: YC 2018 Startup School Grant Award
accomplishment_honors_awards.description:
Only 100 fast-growing startups from YC Startup School batch 2018 (15,442 founders registered,
5,065 graduated) received the award.

accomplishment_honors_awards.title: Winner of YouTube NextUp Indonesia 2017
accomplishment_honors_awards.description: 12 YouTube channels from Indonesia were selected to win the 1st YouTube NextUp Indonesia. As rising creators we received the opportunities to get equipment voucher, workshop at Creator Camp, and account management by the YouTube partnership team.

accomplishment_honors_awards.title: Runner-Up in Special Category of Public Complaints, Hackathon Merdeka 3.0
accomplishment_honors_awards.description: We built a working prototype of an apps that offers a guided experience for public service sector. The apps is called Angkringan (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HmPae6Q-_0c). My presentation can be watched here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ysFiKEtkWjA.

accomplishment_honors_awards.title: Excellence Scholarship for Researcher
accomplishment_honors_awards.issuer: Ministry of Education and Culture Republic of Indonesia

accomplishment_honors_awards.title: Nominator in category of Student Digital Interactive Media - INAICTA 2011
accomplishment_honors_awards.issuer: Ministry of Communication and Informatics Republic of Indonesia
accomplishment_honors_awards.description: I was collaborating with Faikar Izzani from Visual Communication Design Department to develop a multi-touch table-top application for Mandala Wangsit Siliwangi Museum. We were trying to bring technological touch to the gloomy museum. A part of our work can be seen in this video http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XbGloiRoxUs

accomplishment_honors_awards.title: Best Creativity - Indonesian Rocketry Contest: Komurindo 2011
accomplishment_honors_awards.issuer: Directorate General of Higher Education, Ministry of Education, Indonesia
accomplishment_honors_awards.description: Komurindo (Kompetisi Muatan Roket Indonesia) is a national competition to design and implement payload for Attitude Monitoring and Surveillance Rocket.

accomplishment_honors_awards.title: 5th Winner - National PLC Programming Contest
accomplishment_honors_awards.description: Amril Hidayat and I teamed up in this competition to solve given problems by programming the PLC.
